## ModelRegistry.getBoundingBox() method

Retrieves the bounding box of a model.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBoundingBox(modelUri: string): ModelBoundingBox;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The URI of the model to retrieve the bounding box for.
